title: 92/339/EEC: Commission Decision of 2 June 1992 establishing the status of Ireland as regards Newcastle disease
header:
COMMISSION DECISION
of 2 June 1992
establishing the status  of Ireland as regards Newcastle Disease
(92/339/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE  EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Ireland fulfills the criteria fixed by  Article 12 (2) of Directive 90/539/EEC.
This decision is addressed to the Member  States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 June 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member  of the Commission
